ModMetaData.name: 守护星Plus(Star Ability)
ModMetaData.author: quanquan
ModMetaData.description:
StarWand——A star staff can shoot stars or beams of light.
Star Shield——Psychic ability. Similar to bullet shield backpack. StarWingman——Psychic ability. Summon four automatic shooting wingmen. MasterSpark——Psychic ability. A powerful beam.
--------------------我是分割线-------------------
星星权杖-可以射出星星或者光束的武器。
星光壁垒-灵能。类似子弹护盾背包，可向外射击。 召唤僚机-灵能。召唤四个自动射击的僚机。 MasterSpark-灵能。一道或许是手电筒生成的光束。
